result.notification_message:
There was an error in the LLM execution. Here are some common causes:

1. Unkown Host Exception: Check the host URL for your connection and make sure is correct
2. The API deployment for this resource does not exist: This indicates that the connection might need an updated API key
result.name: LLM request error

result.notification_message: The recent GenAI calls have exceeded the threshold that you defined. If this usage is expected, consider raising the monitor threshold higher.
result.name: GenAI call rate

result.notification_subject: Post-processing error in Generative AI Controller
result.notification_message:
There were errors in Generative AI Controller post-processing. Here are some common post-processing issues and their corresponding error codes:

300001: Error in Trust Builder response.
Error occurred in the Trust Builder Post-Processor. Check the GenAITrustBuilderResponsePostProcessor action in Flow Designer for more details.

300002: Error in validating response.
Something went wrong with the response validator (sys_generative_ai_response_validator) for the given capability definition.

300100: Hallucination threshold exceeded for Trust Builder.
The offensiveness score returned by Trust Builder exceeds the threshold defined in sn_generative_ai.hallucination threshold sysprop.  Check the GenAITrustBuilderResponsePostProcessor action in Flow Designer for more details.

300200: Offensiveness threshold exceeded for Trust Builder.
The offensiveness score returned by Trust Builder exceeds the threshold defined in sys_gen_ai_control_setting_data.  Check the GenAITrustBuilderResponsePostProcessor action in Flow Designer for more details.
result.name: Post-processing error

result.notification_subject: Pre-processing error in Generative AI Controller
result.notification_message:
There was an error in the Generative AI Controller pre-processing workflow. Here are some common pre-processing issues and their corresponding error codes:

100001: Min Word Count restriction error. The source doesn't have the minimum number of words required to complete the request. 
The final request prompt should have a minimum word count. The word count of the prompt is checked against the Min Word Count field in the sys_generative_ai_config table for the definition being used.

100002: Missing _meta property in the request.
An error occurred while processing the request before it reached the FDIH subflow. Go to flow context executions and check the input being passed to the pre-processor. Most likely a malformed JSON was sent to the pre-processor as input.

100003: Missing mandatory attributes in the request.
The request is expecting a capability attribute that it's marked as mandatory. Go to sys_one_extend_capability and open the record for the capability being used. Under the OE Capability Attributes tab, verify that your request has the mandatory attributes.

100004: Error occurred while preparing the request.
This error is common when the active prompt configuration not found for given capability definition.

100005: Error occurred while executing request validators in the pre-processor
Something went wrong with the request validator (sys_generative_ai_request_validator) for the given capability definition.
result.name: Pre-processing error
